system.description:
You know how to strike in order to disrupt concentration at the expense of your other adept techniques.

Once per turn, when a creature you can see within 60 ft of you casts a spell, you can spend an exertion point to make a Wisdom (Perception) or Wisdom (Insight) against their Spell Save DC. On a success, you gain the following effects when you take the Attack action against this creature:

  • You gain an expertise dice for those attack rolls.
  • On a hit, the target's DC for the concentration checks uses your Combat Maneuver DC, or half the damage received, whichever is higher.
  • On a hit, the target has disadvantage on checks made to maintain concentration, but has advantage on checks made to resist effects from your Focus Features (such as Stunning Strike).

These effects last either for one minute, until you choose to end it, or until you use this feature on a different target.
